sourcesContent:
import {
  Box,
  Card,
  CardHeader,
  CardBody,
  CardFooter,
  Text,
  Image,
} from '@chakra-ui/react';

const Dashboard = () => {
  return (
    <Box
      bgColor="white"
      w="100%"
      display="flex"
      h="auto"
      padding="32px"
      gap="24px"
    >
        {/* ===================================STUDENT================================ */}
      <Box
        bgColor="blue.50"
        w="100%"
        height="auto"
        padding="16px"
        gap="8px"
        borderRadius="8px"
      >
        <Box>
          <Image
            src={window.location.origin + '/bx-group.png'}
            width="40px"
            height="40px"
          />
          <Text fontSize="14px" fontWeight="bold" color="blue.800">
            Student
          </Text>
        </Box>
        <Box>
          <Text
            fontSize="30px"
            fontWeight="bold"
            color="gray.900"
            textAlign="right"
          >
            243
          </Text>
        </Box>
      </Box>
      {/* ===================================COURSE================================ */}
      <Box
        bgColor="blue.50"
        w="100%"
        height="auto"
        padding="16px"
        gap="8px"
        borderRadius="8px"
      >
        <Box>
          <Image
            src={window.location.origin + '/bx-group.png'}
            width="40px"
            height="40px"
          />
          <Text fontSize="14px" fontWeight="bold" color="blue.800">
            Student
          </Text>
        </Box>
        <Box>
          <Text
            fontSize="30px"
            fontWeight="bold"
            color="gray.900"
            textAlign="right"
          >
            243
          </Text>
        </Box>
      </Box>
      {/* ===================================Payment================================ */}
      <Box
        bgColor="blue.50"
        w="100%"
        height="auto"
        padding="16px"
        gap="8px"
        borderRadius="8px"
      >
        <Box>
          <Image
            src={window.location.origin + '/bx-group.png'}
            width="40px"
            height="40px"
          />
          <Text fontSize="14px" fontWeight="bold" color="blue.800">
            Student
          </Text>
        </Box>
        <Box>
          <Text
            fontSize="30px"
            fontWeight="bold"
            color="gray.900"
            textAlign="right"
          >
            243
          </Text>
        </Box>
      </Box>
      {/* ===================================USER================================ */}
      <Box
        bgColor="pink.50"
        w="100%"
        height="auto"
        padding="16px"
        gap="8px"
        borderRadius="8px"
      >
        <Box>
          <Image
            src={window.location.origin + '/bx-group.png'}
            width="40px"
            height="40px"
          />
          <Text fontSize="14px" fontWeight="bold" color="blue.800">
            Student
          </Text>
        </Box>
        <Box>
          <Text
            fontSize="30px"
            fontWeight="bold"
            color="gray.900"
            textAlign="right"
          >
            243
          </Text>
        </Box>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default Dashboard;
